note.p: American. Son of Samuel and Anne Mead Ashburner. Resided in Kensington, London, with his parents, 1881 and 1891. Died in London.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/29/56/56), 1891 (RG12/21/183/37)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 October 2021)
